DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - To identify 100 patient Head Neck Tumor Tissue Repository Clinical Database treat cetuximab monotherapy cetuximab-containing combination therapy standard care recurrent and/or metastatic head neck squamous cell carcinoma Vanderbilt University Medical Center . - To assay diversity gene protein expression pattern see patient . - To identify predictive pattern associate treatment response survival patient correlate laboratory data clinical data . OUTLINE : Tumor tissue specimens clinical data obtain Head Neck Tumor Tissue Repository Clinical Database protocol VU-VICC-HN-0356 . Specimens analyze pattern gene protein expression predictive cetuximab treatment response survival DNA microarray , tissue microarray , reverse transcriptase-PCR , mass spectroscopy .
